name: MC-420
description:
Therapist Dr. Anna Atsuko and engineer Bill Pentecost have devoted their lives to their own, special invention - the MC-420, a machine that helps people remember long-forgotten happy memories, granting them some much-needed reprieve from the harshness of the world.

Soon after Anna begins using the new machine however, things start to go wrong - before long, she's not quite the same...

Discover the therapy of tomorrow

This dystopian visual novel is entirely linear, full of dramatic camera angles, and was made in about 48 hours for the AdvXJam 2020. To play, simply click or press any key to advance the dialogue.

Discover several patients' stories in near-future England and ponder the implications of future technology supposed to make us happy... even if that happiness comes at a price.
